fields.name: Toxik
fields.title: Gaming for everyone.
fields.description: Toxik Entertainment SA is a French video game company headquartered in Montreuil with several development studios across the world. It publishes games for several video game franchises, including Rayman, Raving Rabbids, Prince of Persia, Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Just Dance, and Tom Clancy.
fields.approach: With the branding for Toxik, we focused on the feeling of both exploration and freedom. We were able to combine  the gaming for a monogram that makes it that Toxik really does you give you the freedom to game anywhere.

fields.name: Chimp Apparel
fields.title: The Toughest
fields.description: Chimp Apparel is the fastest growing clothing brand in 2020. They are focused on designing and manufacturing the best outdoor gear on the planet. They are completely curelty free and vegan!
fields.approach: With the branding for Chimp Apparel, we focused on the feeling of both exploration and freedom. We were able to combine both the gorilla & outdoors for a monogram that makes it that Chimp Apparel really does you give you the freedom to go anywhere.

fields.name: Winking Guru
fields.title: Photography perfection
fields.description: Photography is the art, application and practice of creating durable images by recording light or other electromagnetic radiation, either electronically by means of an image sensor, or chemically by means of a light-sensitive material such as photographic film.
fields.approach: With the branding for Winking Guru, we focused on the feeling of both exploration and freedom. We were able to show that photography is for everyone and it shows that Winking Guru really does you give you the freedom to photograph anywhere.

fields.name: Bijou Beat Studios
fields.title: Best Studios in the East
fields.description: A recording studio is a specialized facility for sound recording, mixing, and audio production of instrumental or vocal musical performances, spoken words, and other sounds. They range in size from a small in-home project studio large enough to record a single singer-guitarist, to a large building with space for a full orchestra of 100 or more musicians. Ideally both the recording and monitoring (listening and mixing) spaces are specially designed by an acoustician or audio engineer to achieve optimum acoustic properties (acoustic isolation or diffusion or absorption of reflected sound echoes that could otherwise interfere with the sound heard by the listener).
fields.approach: With the branding for Bijou Beat Studios, we focused on the feeling of both peace and freedom. We were able to show that music is for everyone and it shows that Bijou beat studios really does you give you the freedom to produce music.

fields.name: Gadget Tree
fields.title: Gadget's Galore
fields.description: Gadget's galore is the leading tech gadget seller in Europe! They sell accessories, devices and lots more. They are well known for exceptional quality and great customer service.
fields.approach: With the branding for Gadget Tree, we focused on the feeling of both Plain and Simple. We were able to show that technology is developing rapidy and that Gadget Tree can give you the latest tech.

fields.name: Strike 11
fields.title: Sports Apparel
fields.description: As the global leader in licensed sports merchandise, Strike 11 is changing the way fans purchase their favorite team apparel and jerseys through an innovative, tech-infused approach to making and selling fan gear in today’s on-demand culture.  Powering multi-channel commerce for the world’s biggest sports brands, Strike 11 offers the largest collection of timeless and timely merchandise whether shopping online, on your phone, in stores, in stadiums or on-site at the world’s biggest sporting events.
fields.approach: With the branding for Strike 11, we focused on the feeling of both Simple and variety. We were able to show that sports is such a widely supported industry and Strike 11 sells the best goods in the world.
